thread.title: DELTARUNE Chapters 1-4 Releasing June 5

author: Casey Scheld
title: DELTARUNE Chapters 1-4 Releasing June 5
text:
Now’s your chance to be a big shot – Toby Fox’s DELTARUNE Chapters 1-4 are set to release on PC and consoles June 5, 2025.
A story that runs parallel to UNDERTALE ( check out our review ), DELTARUNE features a mysterious world that players will explore with Kris and his friends. Tying into UNDERTALE, familiar faces like Toriel and Sans also make an appearance.
Gameplay-wise, the battles of DELTARUNE pay host to creative bullet-dodging mechanics that were inspired by games like Touhou and Chrono Trigger.
Created by Everdraed, with sepia animation done by Temmie Chang, and music by Toby Fox (and additional arrangement and production by Camellia), be sure to check out the officia DELTARUNE Nintendo Switch 2 reveal trailer below:
DELTARUNE Nintendo Switch 2 Announce Trailer DELTARUNE Chapters 1-4 will be available for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC via Steam. For those looking to get a jump on things, be sure to wishlist the title via the official website .
Can’t wait that long? All those interested can try DELTARUNE Chapter 1 and 2 for free.
Source: Official Website
